metadata.title: CVE-2022-31796 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: libjpeg 1.63 has a heap-based buffer over-read in HierarchicalBitmapRequester::FetchRegion in hierarchicalbitmaprequester.cpp because the MCU size can be different between allocation and use.

notes.note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8

criterions.comment: libjpeg package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
